content: finished measurements width along top edge 46 depth in center 23 this shawl is worked from the top down errata 7/31/2023 row 5 revised to add more clarity about stitch placement this has been corrected as follows row 5 chain 1 single_crochet in first 2 double_crochet single_crochet in chain-2 space * chain 9 single_crochet in chain-3 space bet next 2 3-double_crochet groups repeat from * 5 more times chain 9 single_crochet in chain-2 space single_crochet in last 2 double_crochet turn 7 chain-9 sps
